Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with traces of band in added white; exterior: painted decoration consisting of unclear floral or animal motif; dotted circle as filling ornament.
Curator's comments: Lemos describes the image on the sherd as a lion's paws to left amongst filling ornament (Lemos 1991, 240).
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 240, no. 209)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0127) (phase 2)
